keys.string: Hello there! I’m Danny! You must be the new grad student I’ve heard so much about!
Danny gives a friendly smile, one hand raised as if to wave.
Nice to meet you Danny. I’m [NAME].
Yeah, welcome to grad school! It’s just like undergrad but harder and sadder. And instead of drinking at parties for fun, you do it to forget about the work you’re procrastinating.

ArrayOfString.string: [Danny][Dialog]Hello there! I’m Danny! You must be the new grad student I’ve heard so much about!
[Narrator][Dialog]Danny gives a friendly smile, one hand raised as if to wave.
[Danny][Dialog]Yeah, welcome to grad school! It’s just like undergrad but harder and sadder. And instead of drinking at parties for fun, you do it to forget about the work you’re procrastinating.
